LoyaltyLedgerTraceability.name: LoyaltyLedgerTraceability
LoyaltyLedgerTraceability.description: Represents a tracker for the loyalty ledger. The debit ledger consumes points from the linked credit ledger for a member redemption or an accrual cancellation.

ActionType.description: Required. Specifies the action that creates an entry in the ledger.

CreditLoyaltyLedgerId.description: Required. The credit type loyalty ledger associated with the loyalty ledger tracker. Points are consumed from the credit type ledger for the loyalty program member's debit type ledger.

DebitLoyaltyLedgerId.description: Required. The debit ledger associated with the loyalty ledger tracker. Points are consumed by the debit ledger from the loyalty program member's point balance.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyPgmCurrencySubtypeId.description: The ID of the loyalty program currency subtype associated with the related loyalty ledger.

LoyaltyProgramCurrencyId.description: The ID of the loyalty program currency associated with the related loyalty ledger.

LoyaltyProgramMemberId.description: The ID of the loyalty program member associated with the related loyalty ledger.

Name.description: The autogenerated number of the record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

Points.description: Required. The number of points used from the credit ledger by the debit ledger.
